title: A Process does not list on x64dbg attach list
content:
I'm learning RE with x64dbg on Windows10. It does not list a process in the running process list that I want to attach. The Process is running 32-bit crackme application for learning.

It was created by eagle0wl.

http://www.mysys.org/eagle0wl/

Why x64dbg does not list process? I have checked that x64dbg on privilege permission and windows Smart Screen is disabled and so on.

I have no idea why the process does not list as an attached process.

Windows 10 20H2

comments.text: I have the 64-bit version running and also does not see the process.

answers_data.content:
x64dbg comes in two versions, 32 and 64 bits.

You need to run the 32-bit version of x64dbg to detect a 32-bit application.

comments.text: It does not need something additional operation?

Not sure if I got what you're trying to say. Generally, you just need to get into the x32 folder, and execute the debugger executable from there, and then hopefully you will be able to find your 32-bit app.
Eventually I found x32dbg in x64dbg installation directory!
That's nice, did you try it and did it work?
It works and It can attach 32bit process
